snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average gained 128.66 points and the S.& P. 500 rose 7.52, but the Nasdaq slipped 7.92 points.
abstract: Dow Jones industrial average sets another record, bolstered in part by gains in Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average gained 128.66 points and the S.& P. 500 rose 7.52, but the Nasdaq slipped 7.92 points.

headline.main: Microsoft Helps Lift the Dow as Investors Await New Data
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Helps Lift the Dow As Investors Await New Data
